title.rendered: Marseille and Prague Tour Dates Rescheduled

content.rendered:
Bruce Springsteen and The E Street Band’s postponed tour dates at Marseille’s Orange Vélodrome and Prague’s Airport Letnany have been rescheduled and announced for the summer of 2025. Rescheduled dates and information for Milan’s San Siro Stadium will follow.

May 31, 2025 – Marseille, France @ Orange Vélodrome (rescheduled from May 25, 2024)

June 15, 2025 – Prague, Czech Republic @ Airport Letnany (rescheduled from May 28, 2024)

All tickets for the postponed performances remain valid for the newly announced dates. For those who wish, refunds will be available at the original point of purchase for both shows. For Marseille, refunds will be available through July 31, 2024 — and for Prague, they will be available through September 3, 2024.
